author: kushagrajindal
content: Hi everyone, how do i run the devnet6 in my infrastructure. Is there any guide or references for help to setup the consensys node as well as the execution node in my local?

author: parithosh
content: Its still in a pre-launch state, i'd probably wait till more clients are on there and it feels more stable unless there's something you want to urgently test

author: kushagrajindal
content: <@199561711278227457> thanks for the update. Not something that i need to urgently test, just curious to learn more about it.

author: barnabasbusa
content: If you have ever participated in any earlier devnets/testnets, its going to be quite similar. We provide a genesis.ssz and you can set that as the initial state, and sync off of other peers provided here: https://4844-devnet-6.ethpandaops.io
